props.ampRulestext:
Telekinesis

This allows you to physically manipulate objects with your mind. Any object within range of sight, not within the aura of a living creature, can be moved. If the object is subject to any physical test, you use your Focus pool instead of your Brawn pool, and your Resolve pool instead of your Finesse pool. Your range for throwing objects is twice your Willpower, and your damage for thrown objects is equal to 2 plus half your Willpower.
